brief_description: Provides main menu systems and navigation interfaces for user access to application functions.
business_purpose: This function serves as the primary entry point and navigation hub for the card management system, providing role-based menu access and routing users to appropriate application functions. It ensures proper user experience through intuitive navigation while maintaining security through role-based access control and proper menu presentation.

components.name: CM00
components.business_function: Main application menu and navigation hub
